div.p: S.I., S.H. and J.S. designed the research. J.S., M.L., S.P. and B.J. performed field samplings and provided meteorological and chemical observation data. S.I., S.H., J.S., E.A. and F.A. took chemical/isotopic measurements. S.I., S.H., J.S., M.L. and N.Y. interpreted the data. S.I. and S.H. wrote the paper with contributions from all coauthors.
